original_title: The Orson Welles War Of The Worlds Scandal
overview: Ladies and gentlemen, I have a grave announcement to make! Those strange beings who landed in the Jersey farmlands tonight are the vanguard of an invading army from the planet Mars!" On October 30, 1938, Americans became so totally captivated by an Orson Welles’ radio drama that they actually believed that if wasn’t just theater, but a real news broadcast.
title: The Orson Welles War Of The Worlds Scandal
